amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to pay a performance bonus to any senior IRS employee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit the use of funds to pay a performance bonus to any senior IRS employee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Gosar.
